dataset.name: Deep Circulation in the Gulf of Maine (7/85-8/87)

attribute.name: title
attribute.value: 3011-A.cdf - Deep Circulation in the Gulf of Maine

attribute.name: summary
attribute.value: A two-year field study to investigate the deep flow between the major basins in the Gulf of Maine and the effects on the distribution of suspended sediments.
